analysis.description:
Object.withdrawnTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x2916e6412ad4f67ebbf9f597b8c15cc665826a36.sol#140-151) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(token).transfer(_to,balance) (/unique_chucks/47/0x2916e6412ad4f67ebbf9f597b8c15cc665826a36.sol#148-149)

ERC20.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x2916e6412ad4f67ebbf9f597b8c15cc665826a36.sol#234-235)
ERC20Interface.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x2916e6412ad4f67ebbf9f597b8c15cc665826a36.sol#121)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/47/0x2916e6412ad4f67ebbf9f597b8c15cc665826a36.sol#80-81:
